com.smarthome.emulator.simulations.basis

Class Sensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smarthome.emulator.simulations.basis.SensorAll

  • public class Sensor
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores information about sensor and it's values, values history, creates messages for server and sends them to Adapter, generates new values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sensor

        public Sensor(Adapter adapter,
      int id,
      java.util.Properties properties)
        Creates new sensor by parsing information about sensor from properties given as parameter. Also initializes, not starts, timer. Constructor used for non-GUI purposes, ignores all sensors GUI properties.
        Parameters:
        adapter - adapter that owns this sensor
        id - new sensor's id
        properties - information about sensor

      • Sensor

        public Sensor(Adapter adapter,
      SensorPanel panel,
      int id)
        Creates new sensor by parsing information about sensor from properties given as parameter. Also initializes, not starts, timer. Constructor used for GUI purposes.
        Parameters:
        adapter - adapter that owns this sensor
        panel - GUI panel for showing sensor information
        id - new sensor's id

    • Method Detail

      • buildSensorMessage

        public java.nio.ByteBuffer buildSensorMessage(java.nio.ByteBuffer message)
        Appends sensor' information to message according to adapter <-> server communication protocol after adapter information given as parameter
        Parameters:
        message - adapter message to server
        Returns:
        full message containing adapter and sensor information
